content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Came here for lunch on a Saturday. There weren't many people dining in at the time so we got seated right away. The store is clean and service is decent.We ordered Seongbukdong Gukbap and Sogogi Sundubu. Portion size was smaller than expected. I normally couldn't finish a soup but was able to here and didn't feel I was full. Taste wise, it's not salty so that's good but nothing amazing that will make me come back again.
